document.full_text: sam walton's descendants are poised to see their stake in the $190 billion company creep above 50 percent, without much fanfare, thanks to the latest $15 billion share buyback program.
document.title: reuters breakingviews: wal-mart control soon to tip to the waltons
lines_and_colors: sam walton's descendants are poised to see their stake in the $190 billion company creep above 50 percent, without much fanfare, thanks to the latest $15 billion share buyback program.
